author: astitcher
msg: QPID-1198 (Partial): Missing header files that are really needed
Compilation works on Linux due to implicit header inclusions but
Some tightening up of std and global namespace use.

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-1198 (Partial): Add #include <alloca.h> for all uses of ::alloca()

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-1198 (Partial): replace all uses of u_intX_t with uintX_t
The u_int* versions are not available in the Sun header files.
In any case using only uint* is more consistent

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-1198 (Partial): Added explicit namespaces that the Sun C++ requires (that gcc doesn't)
It's not clear at this point whether there is a compiler problem with gcc that it does find
the symbols in the namespaces or SunCC that it doesn't!
